attributes.action: CORRECTING THE BENIFIT SYSTEM,  AS BECAUSE THE BENIFIT SYSTEM IS NOT RIGHT, I HAVN'T LIVED A LIFE BUT WORKED HARD TOWARDS SOLVING WORLD PROBLEM.
attributes.additional_details: BRITISH DOESN'T MEAN ENGLISH , IRISH, SCOTTISH, WELSH, OR HAVING A BRITISH PASSPORT.  A PERSON WORKING TOWARDS SOLVING WORLD PROBLEM IS WHO IS CALLED BRITISH.  WHAT I WANT A TEAM TO WORK WITH ME ,  SUCH AS MENTAL HEALTH TEAM , PSYCHARTRIST, DOCTORS, BUT THE  CURRENT SITUATION IS ALL THESE PEOPLE HAVE MANAGERS, THESE PEOPLE MUST HAVE BREAK THROUGH THIS SITUATION, BUT I AM DOING IT FOR THEM, STILL THEY ARE NOT ABLE TO COME OUT.  I THOUGHT THESE PSYCHARTISTS, DOCTORS HAVE STONE HEADS, SO I PLAN A STATEGY, BY WRITING AND TALKING TO THEM. BUT THESE PEOPLE PUT ME IN TOTURE/RISK. .  LATER FOUND OUT THEY DON'T HAVE STONE HEADS, THEY HAVE EMPTY HEADS, 25% FILLED WITH HUMAN ANATOMY(THATS FULL OF HUMAN ANATOMY)  75% EMPTY.  AS I WAS ABLE TO GET THROUGH STONE HEADS, NOT ABE TO GET THROUGH EMPTY HEADS, AS ITS VACCUM, EMPTY HEADS NO KNOWLEDGE.
